comment: New data indication, 0: retransmission, 1: new data
antenna port index list, support from 1000 to 1003
Refer to section 7.3.1.1 in spec 38.211,It equals the higher-layer parameter Datascrambling-
Identity if configured, and the RNTI equals the C-RNTI, otherwise L2 needs to set it to physical cell id.

DMRS.comment: choose 'CRB0' or 'CORESET0' following to 38.211 7.4.1.1 The reference point for k
if 'CRB0', reference point is subcarrier 0 in common resource block 0
if CORESET0: subcarrier 0 of the lowest-numbered resource block in CORESET 0
Nnscid_Nid,Refer to section 7.4.1.1.2 in spec 38.211 It is given by the higher-layer parameter DL-DMRSScrambling-
ID if provided, or Physical cell id
DL DMRS symbol number, 1: single symbol,  2: double symbol
DM-RS CDM groups without data, 38.214 5.1.6.2 the number of DM-RS CDM groups without data
DL additional DMRS position DL-DMRS-add-pos Value: from 0 to 3

comment: Resource block bundle size L, refer to section  7.3.1.6 in spec 38.211
Start symbol index of PDSCH mapping, include both DMRS and data
PDSCH duration in symbols include both DMRS and data
Resource allocation type (currently only support type 1). 0: type0, 1:type1

ResAlloType1.comment: For resource allocation type 1.The starting resource block for this ULSCH allocation
The number of resource blocks allocated to this     DLSCH grant.

codebook.comment: True: generate codebook, False: no codebook
codebookType in 38.214  0: Type1 Single-Panel 1: Type I Multi-Panel 2: Type II, 3: Type II Port Selection
Codebook index Refer to Table 5.2.2.2.1-1 in 38.214
n1_n2 = n1 << 8 + n2, n1 n2 values are corresponding to table 5.2.2.2.2.1-2 in 38.214

comment: slot offset list in the period
